title: Live Christmas Music
description: Various musicians perform Christmas music throughout the day.

title: Freebie Friday
description: On the first friday of each month, all our restaurants offer one item on the menu for free.

title: Valentine's Day Giveaway
description: Every ticket purchased by visitors counts as an entry in our giveaway! Prizes include gift cards and staycation experiences.

title: Easter Fun
description: Solve riddles and follow the clues to get a prize at the end of our Easter egg scavenger hunt! Stop by the petting zoo to meet our bunnies and the Easter bunny as well!
